title: Very Happy - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Child Abuse   Clingy Lover   Complex Family Relationships   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Famous Parents   Fast Learner   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Orphans   Past Trauma   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Possessive Characters   Shameless Protagonist   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Unconditional Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
Li Zhao is a poor, 20-year-old actor who only thinks of where his next meal is coming from. After growing up in a child only facility, Li Zhao has taken on a very optimistic personality even while raising money for those he sees as family.

On the other hand, 28-year-old rich businessman Yan Ting is super pessimistic. 

Yan Ting: Life is no fun. What is the difference between life and death?

Li Zhao: Life is very happy.

The world in Yan Ting’s heart was very grey until he met Li Zhao. He thought, this must be the liveliest person in the world. Otherwise, how could Li Zhao be so lively in his heart every day?>
